text: Valérie Boyer (born 11 June 1962) is a French politician. She is a member of The Republicans party. Since 2007, she has served as a member of the National Assembly for the department of Bouches-du-Rhône. She was born in Bourges. In March 2020, during the 2019–20 coronavirus pandemic, Boyer tested positive for COVID-19. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:People from Bourges Category:Politicians from Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur Category:Politicians from Centre-Val de Loire
title: Valérie Boyer
